title: Organic Shop at La Citta dell'Altra Economia
description: City of the Other Economy is 3500sq.m of a renovated 19th century slaughterhouse. There's an organic shop selling fresh produce, wine, olive oil, cleaning products, and other things. There's also a fair-trade shop selling food and clothes, a recycled boutique clothes and accessories and furniture, an organic bar and restaurant, exhibition spaces, a screening room, a meeting room, a branch of the Italian Banca Etica, and a monthly outdoor market. Directions: Metro line B, get off at Piramide. By bus: Line 75, get off at Marmorata-Galvani.
